# Ignore Terraform state files
*.tfstate
*.tfstate.backup

# Ignore Terraform variable files with sensitive information
*.tfvars
!terraform.tfvars.example

# Ignore crash log files
crash.log

# Ignore Terraform lock file
.terraform.lock.hcl

# Ignore .terraform directory
.terraform/

# Ignore sensitive environment variables and secrets
.env
.env.*

# Ignore output files
*.tfplan
*.zip

# Ignore local IDE and editor settings
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.bak

# Ignore log files
*.log

# Ignore auto-generated documentation
docs/

# Ignore temporary files and folders
*.tmp
.DS_Store
